for i,item in enumerate(discussion_items):

    if isinstance(item,dict):
        topic = item.get("topic","topic")
        url = item.get("url",None)
        opts = item.get("opts","")
        if opts:
            opts = f"{{ {opts} }}"
        post_text = item.get("post-text","")
        if url:
            s = f"\n* [{topic}]({url}){opts}{post_text}"
        else:
            s = f"\n* {topic}"
        print(s)

    elif isinstance(item,str):
        print(f"* {item}\n")

""")

for i,item in enumerate(lecture_topics):
    if isinstance(item,dict):
        topic = item.get("topic","topic")
        url = item.get("url","url")  # this contains filename to include

        internal_link = f"#"+topic.lower().replace(" ","-")
        s = f"\n* [{topic}]({internal_link})"
        print(s)

    elif isinstance(item,str):
        print(f"* {item}\n")
